index.title: Entries
index.content: Your private journal entries are tracked here, you can return to what you've written. You can also add new entries here.

view-entry.title: Entry
view-entry.content: You can view each entry individually and edit it easily on this screen. Double click the text to edit.

feed.title: Booths
feed.content: Booths are spaces intended to support you on your journey. Here, you can revisit existing booths, or create a new booth.

homescreen.title: Booth Home
homescreen.content: Your booth is your temporary, here you'll find the task-management, journalling, roadmapping and time-management tools.

index.title: Cycles
index.content:
Cycles are intended to help track your transient progress, whilst naturally incorporating regular breaks to help balance work and leisure.
'n Here you can explore past and ongoing cycles.

cycle.title: Cycle
cycle.content: Each cycle is intended to track transient progress, use this screen to stay focused on a specific cycle.

index.title: Time Tracking
index.content:
These time management tools are intended to help you put time towards whatever is important to you. 

 Create a collection of allocated time, and then add specifically allocated time to that collection and you can track the time you spend on it as you go along ðŸ™‚

index.title: Roadmaps
index.content: Roadmaps are intended to help facilitate direction and growth. From here you can view all your roadmaps in one place.

roadmap.title: Roadmap
roadmap.content: A singular roadmap is intended to help focus on a specific strand of your current journey. Each roadmap can consist of many segments and steps, you can break down the journey further or focus on any part of it.
